description: [Cards of Light and Dark]
This ship can lay down special light and dark cards. The cards inflict area of effect damage.
[Silvergrass and the Pale Moon]
This ship can generate a special field that fires high-damage energy balls.
1.name: Hiryuu META

description: [Renegade Sniper]
This ship can conjure hovering cannons that fire at you.
[Shadow Skirmisher]
This ship can spawn phantoms of mass-produced destroyers that fight alongside her.
2.name: Ark Royal META

description: [Scanner Hacking]
This ship can generate a special field. Ships within this field take more damage.
[Zeroth Quadrant Expansion -5%]
This ship can generate a special field that affects the entire battlefield, increasing the damage both sides take.
3.name: Helena META

description: Akatan of Blossoming Flame
This ship can lay down special cards that form chains of fire and explode.
Scorching Seas
This ship can conjure flames across the screen, inflicting the Burn ailment to ships they come in contact with.
4.name: Souryuu META

description: Seething Chains
This ship can conjure binding chains, decreasing the SPD of ships they come in contact with.
Kaiser Torpedoes
This ship can fire supermassive underwater torpedoes that inflict huge damage to Main Fleet ships they come in contact with.
5.name: Gneisenau META

description: Iron Whip
This ship can fire a special spinning barrage.
Kaiser Torpedoes
This ship can fire supermassive underwater torpedoes that inflict huge damage to Main Fleet ships they come in contact with.
6.name: Scharnhorst META

description: Repulsing Pyrotechnics

When the battle starts, this ship can create 3 barriers that reduce the damage she takes. 
<color=#92fc63>Every time your ships fire torpedoes, a main gun volley, or launch an airstrike, the barrier counter increases by 1, 2, and 2, respectively. Every time the barrier counter reaches 6, 1 barrier is negated.</color>
Repulse's Resolve

Each time a "Repulsing Pyrotechnics" barrier is negated, this ship's damage dealt increases and her attack pattern changes. 
<color=#92fc63>Once all barriers have been negated, this ship will enter a ferocious attack phase.</color>
Heart of Lava
This ship can launch huge lava projectiles, inflicting huge damage to Main Fleet ships they come in contact with as well as rendering aircraft carriers Detected.
7.name: Repulse META

description: Meteor Shower
This ship can launch a special barrage consisting of meteors.
Ashen Might - Storm

This ship can execute a charged attack. Every time this attack goes off without being interrupted, this ship's damage dealt increases. 
<color=#92fc63>The second time this attack is successfully executed, this ship's attack pattern changes and her ACC and damage dealt increases, but her damage taken increases.</color>
Ashen Might - Lull

Every time this ship's charged attack is interrupted as a result of damage from your ships, a portion of this ship's HP is restored and her damage taken is decreased. 
<color=#92fc63>The second time this attack is interrupted, this ship's attack pattern changes and her damage taken decreases, but her ACC and damage dealt decreases.</color>
Heart of Lava
This ship can launch huge lava projectiles, inflicting huge damage to Main Fleet ships they come in contact with as well as rendering aircraft carriers Detected.
8.name: Renown META

description: Contagious Lament

This ship summons a blue fog during battle. Ships inside this fog have reduced SPD and take more DMG.
The fog's debuffs <color=#92fc63>become stronger the longer your ships remain inside the fog</color>. The debuffs gradually disappear once your ships exit the fog.
Sea of Black Tears

When an enemy ship's max HP falls below 50.0%, she begins recovering HP for the rest of the battle.
When an enemy ship's max HP falls below 20.0%, <color=#92fc63>all her HP recovery will instead be dealt as DMG.</color>
9.name: Arizona META

description: Dominion Expansion

This ship exerts a field of dominion and summons Phantom Knights during battle. <color=#92fc63>The Phantom Knights are resistant to attacks from non-META ships</color>. 
Once all Phantom Knights have been defeated, this ship <color=#92fc63>becomes weaker</color> and permanently takes increased DMG.
META Affinity
This ship takes more DMG from your META ships, but also deals more DMG to your non-META ships.
10.name: Queen Elizabeth META
